import React, { useEffect , useState} from 'react' import FetchUpComingQuery from '../../hooks/getUpComing' import Year from '../../dashboard/Radios/year' import Country from '../../dashboard/Radios/country' import Genre from '../../dashboard/Radios/genre' import Quality from '../../dashboard/Radios/quality' import Rating from '../../dashboard/Radios/rating' import Release from '../../dashboard/Radios/release' import Type from '../../dashboard/Radios/type' import Loader from "react-loader-spinner" import FetchPaginateUpComingQuery from '../../hooks/pagenateUpcoming' import FetchTrendsQuery from '../../hooks/getAllTrends' export default function NewReleased(){ // const { isLoading, isFetching, data } = FetchUpComingQuery() const [isOpen, setIsopen] = useState(false) const [activeDropdown, setActiveDropdown] = useState(''); const [currentPage, setCurrentPage ] = useState(1) const {data:upcoming, isLoading, isError } = FetchPaginateUpComingQuery(currentPage) const {data:movies} = FetchTrendsQuery() const handlePreviousPage = () => { if (currentPage > 1) { setCurrentPage(currentPage - 1); } }; const handleNextPage = () => { setCurrentPage(currentPage + 1); }; const styleComponent = "mr-1 text-white bg-filterColor h-[30px] hover:bg-changeColor focus:ring-4 focus:outline-none focus:ring-blue-300 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-4 py-2.5 text-center inline-flex items-center dark:bg-blue-600 dark:hover:bg-blue-700 dark:focus:ring-blue-800" const buttonStyle = 'rounded bg-[#1a212d] ml-2 my-2 px-2 text-center text-[#605f62] h-[30px] font-light text-[12px]' const toggleDropdown = (dropdownName:any) => { if (activeDropdown === dropdownName) { setActiveDropdown(''); } else { setActiveDropdown(dropdownName); console.log('activeDropdown is >>>',activeDropdown) } }; const thumbnailUrls = [ 'https://theperfectroundgolf.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/placeholder.png', 'https://theperfectroundgolf.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/placeholder.png', 'https://theperfectroundgolf.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/placeholder.png', 'https://theperfectroundgolf.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/placeholder.png', 'https://theperfectroundgolf.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/placeholder.png', 'https://theperfectroundgolf.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/placeholder.png', 'https://theperfectroundgolf.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/placeholder.png', 'https://theperfectroundgolf.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/placeholder.png', 'https://theperfectroundgolf.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/placeholder.png', 'https://theperfectroundgolf.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/placeholder.png' ] return (
